page.title: 13Home Living In 1985
page.content: The majority of households have automatic washing machines, a few have twin-tubs.Very few people wash by hand and tumble dryers are widely used. Chilton village has no mains gas. Therefore everyone cooks by electricity. Microwave ovens are becoming increasingly popular and most households have toasters, small grills and coffee percolators. Generally cleaning is done by electric vacuum cleaners. Polishes are usually in aerosol form.In the kitchen and bathroom there is a wide range of cleaning fluids, powders, etc. for every need. Public transport in Chilton is very limited, therefore transport is mostly by car, bicycle or on foot. @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ @@ @@@@@ @@@@@ @@@@@ @@ @@@@@@m@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
